tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicationAdherence (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR,
    dose_amount INT,
    dose_frequency VARCHAR,
    adherence_score INT,
    treatment_outcome VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(100),
    patient_id INT,
    dosage FLOAT,
    frequency VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Adherence (
    adherence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    adherence_date DATE,
    missed_doses INT,
    adherence_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  dob DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AdherenceRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  adherence_status VARCHAR(20),
  recorded_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES Medications(medication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentOutcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  outcome_description TEXT,
  outcome_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES Medications(medication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT NOT NULL,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Medication (
  medication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Adherence (
  adherence_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  medication_id INT NOT NULL,
  adherence_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE TreatmentOutcome (
  outcome_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  outcome_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Visit (
  visit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  visit_date TIMESTAMP
)
